extends java.lang.Object

A utility class used to access a database.

isLoaded

public boolean isLoaded()
Indicate whether this manager has loaded the properties.

Returns:
true if the properties have been loaded, false otherwise.

load

public void load(java.util.Properties props)
          throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                 java.sql.SQLException
Load the configuration properties and check the connection with the database.

Parameters:
props - a set of properties
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - when the connection to the database fails.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when the driver class cannot be found.

load

public void load(java.lang.String loc)
          throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                 java.sql.SQLException,
                 java.io.IOException
Load the configuration properties and check the connection with the database.

Parameters:
loc - a properties file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - when the properties cannot be loaded.
java.sql.SQLException - when the connection to the database fails.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when the driver class cannot be found.

load

public void load(javax.sql.DataSource dataSource)
          throws java.sql.SQLException
Load the configuration properties frrom a DataSource and check the connection with the database.

Parameters:
dataSource - the DataSource to be used.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - when the connection to the database fails.

checkConnection

public void checkConnection()
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
Check that a connection with the database can be established.

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - When the connection cannot be established.

sqlEscape

public java.lang.String sqlEscape(java.lang.String s)
Escape a string so that it can be used inside a quoted statement of a sql query. In other words, single quotes are escaped.

Parameters:
s - The string to process.
Returns:
A string that can be quoted in sql, or null if the input string is null.
